GetImage Choose image source Create new image Add from gallery Camera Permission The App needs the Camera Permission to be able to create new images. Camera Permission Without this permission you will not be able to get new images from your camera. External Storage Permission The App needs access to your external storage to be able to show your images. External Storage Permission Without this permission you will not be able to get new images from your gallery.
